comment: AWESOME PROFESSOR!! I don't know why people are pouting about him. I've taken him since 3100 and he's a great professor and an even better guy. Took him for the capstone strategic management online. Learned a lot and credit much of my deeper understanding of  businesses and how they function to this class. TAKE HIM!

This professor is a JOKE. If you want to spend hours doing pointless busy work that teaches you nothing, this class is for you. If you actually enjoy learning and want to benefit from a class, STAY AWAY from this professor. The work load for this (3100 level) class is ridiculous. This professor is pompous and egotistical, i do NOT recommend him.

HE is a very blunt person and doesn't care for foolish questions/mistakes however... 20% of your grade is discussions which requires 3 posts PER WEEK of 3 sentences. 20% is Learnsmart quizzes which don't even grade you, they are just completion based. Another 20% is the service learning which was easy just time consuming. Medium work, EASY A.

His class has a lot of work but if you do it you will get a good grade. He is pretty understanding and fair in grading. Only 2 tests a midterm and a final (both online). They have a few short essays and multiple choice quizes but are open a long time. There is also weekly work & a Service Learning. If you do work and show up its an easy A.

Dr. Roberts is one of the most involved (read: connected) professors on campus. Get to know him, as he is the head of SIFE. Though them I was able to get an internship with a very cool new company. This is the only professor you should be considering for MGT 3100. Interesting, useful class material, plus hes fair. Take him or be an idiot and don't.

Easy. He is so weird though. Talks nonstop about germans(if there are any in your class) and his daughter in-law. Also makes you do a Service Learning..it's all you will talk about until Mid October. Exams are essays..all online. as well as online quizzes(easy). Pretty Easy Class
Huge amount of workload..Test are essay and MC questions (normally 4-5 essays and 30MC). Weekly discussion plus presentation.

One of the most interesting classes I've ever taken!  Wants to see you either do well or bomb with no in between.  If you give a little effort though, he'll make sure you do well.  His class is a lot of fun. This class is more real world type of information instead of simply reading definitions from a book.  Excellent professor! One of the best!

Classes are pointless because all the work is online but attendance mandatory? Weekly-quizzes, discussions at least 5 to 8 posts even tho he says 3, presentations ON discussions? come on he doesn't even grade them. Service learning project requires you to take off work and use your personal time to help the community? essays for test too which blow

Very arrogant man.  Frequently sarcastic when answering questions.  Tests, and the material in general, weren't hard.  Required a service project which required an inordinate amount of outside-of-class time and proved for many to be a project of futility.  Not an enjoyable experience and wouldn't want to be in another of his classes.

He gives way too much work for an introductory course into a major. The service learning project that he assigns is way too unclear and just helps him out and not you. You don't have to go to class, because he treats all of his classes like online classes he makes really narrow-minded comments about people who disagree with him. Do not take him!!!!
He is a great teacher and gives you a lot of chances to make a good grade in his class. There is work but it is easy.

I took online course, quite a bit of work.  The exams (3) were all essay and time consumming.  Easy to get a good grade in class, but testing was involved.  Weekly quizes and discussion postings required, seemed like there was always something needing to be done for this course.

If you take the online mgt 4199 be warned. He does grade easy, but the amount of work is nearly impossible to complete: 50 page individual paper, group paper, weekly discussion, inidividual powerpoint presentation, weekly group simulation game.
if you do your work you will make an A.  made learing this stuff so easy and i actually retained the info.
